For those companies considering going public, we provide a comprehensive going public accelerator process for private companies seeking capital and liquidity via the public markets. This is an alternative financing path to the conventional, strict venture capital-to-large IPO process, utilizing multiple going public transaction methods: S1; Direct listing (think Spotify); Reg A+; alternative or direct public offering (APO or DPO) structure via public vehicle; or small IPO (SIPO) strategy. These alternative offering structures chronologically follow angel funding and precedes or follow, initial venture capital funding. This financing strategy enables an emerging growth, previously private, company to raise capital in the public markets at potentially much higher valuations over time, earlier in its life cycle, as compared to traditional private financing paths.
